alert.note: Alert for Garland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Garland County through 345 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mountain Pine, or 12 miles west of Hot Springs, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Pine... Meyers... Lake Ouachita State Park... Rockwell... Avant... Royal... Crystal Springs Landing... Sunshine... Hempwallace... Pearcy... Crystal Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
